name: Gauge display
description: A simple widget that display a gauge

device.name: Data to display
device.description: Select the data that you want to display

customYAxisMinMax.name: Set min and max of the gauge
customYAxisMinMax.description: Allow to manually set the min and max of the gauge. If not checked, min and max will be respectively set to 0 and 100

displayMode.name: Display mode
displayMode.description: Choose how the gauge should be displayed

solidColor.name: Solid color
solidColor.description: One color is used to display value

thresholds.name: Thresholds
thresholds.description: Change the gauge color depending on data value

firstColor.name: First color
firstColor.description: Set the color when data is lower than first threshold

addedThresholds.name: Thresholds
addedThresholds.description: Change the gauge color depending on data value (5 thresholds max)

item.name: threshold
item.description: Configure the color to apply to gauge when data becomes greater than threshold

gradient.name: Gradient
gradient.description: Use a gradient from min to max
